meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: LEAD: Combating Global Warming Secretary of State James A. Baker 3d urged an international effort to counter the threat of global warming caused by pollution. Page C7. Prison for Ex-Olympian Bruce Kimball, an Olympic silver medalist in diving in 1984, was sentenced to 17 years for drunken driving that killed two teen-agers and injured three others.

LEAD: Combating Global Warming Secretary of State James A. Baker 3d urged an international effort to counter the threat of global warming caused by pollution. Page C7. Prison for Ex-Olympian Bruce Kimball, an Olympic silver medalist in diving in 1984, was sentenced to 17 years for drunken driving that killed two teen-agers and injured three others.

Combating Global Warming Secretary of State James A. Baker 3d urged an international effort to counter the threat of global warming caused by pollution. Page C7. Prison for Ex-Olympian Bruce Kimball, an Olympic silver medalist in diving in 1984, was sentenced to 17 years for drunken driving that killed two teen-agers and injured three others. Page B7. House Survey on Raise Speaker Jim Wright is surveying House members to determine whether to vote on the 50 percent Congressional pay increase. Page A19.
